name: Legend of the Lancer (Canceled)
blurb: Battle Epic Bosses, Explore multiple towns, Compete in Jousting Tournaments and uncover the mystery behind the Legend of the Lancer!

rewards.reward: WALLPAPER - Exclusive Legend of the Lancer Backer Wallpaper. Thank you for your support of our project! Every Dollar Counts!
FORUM ACCESS + NAME IN CREDITS - Have your named immortalized in the games credit reel at the end of Legend of the Lancer. All previous rewards included.

EARLY BIRD PACKAGE - DRM free digital copy of Legend of the Lancer + PDF Instruction Booklet + 3 hi-res Backer Only Wallpapers. These wallpapers will be different than the $1 tier. All previous rewards included.

FULL PACKAGE - DRM free digital copy of Legend of the Lancer + PDF Instruction Booklet + 3 hi-res Backer Only Wallpapers. These wallpapers will be different than the $1 tier. All previous rewards included.

EARLY BETA ACCESS + CHAINSAW LANCE DLC - Gain access to Beta and help polish and grow Legend of the Lancer. Gain a DLC code to download a exclusive Backer Weapon attachment "Chainsaw Lance". All previous rewards included.

DIGITAL COMPANION ART BOOK + OST + GOLD HORSE MECH DLC - Receive a digtial copy of the game soundtrack from composer Andrea Giachini, DLC code for exclusive backer only skin for your horse, and a PDF book that will contain game assets, concept art, story details, and notes. Also included is an extra copy of the game by Key or Download. All previous rewards included.

SPECIAL T-SHIRT + LANCE KEYCHAIN + PRINTED MAP OF THE WORLD - Receive an exclusive backers only shirt, a machine crafted keychain designed in the style of the Holy Lance, and printed map of the world of Umber. This map will be manufactured on cloth to give a feel of old parchment. All rewards above this price will not include these items. All previous rewards included.

INTERNATIONAL PACKAGE - SPECIAL T-SHIRT + LANCE KEYCHAIN + PRINTED MAP OF THE WORLD - Receive an exclusive backers only shirt, a machine crafted keychain designed in the style of the Holy Lance, and printed map of the world of Umber. This map will be manufactured on cloth to give a feel of old parchment. All rewards above this price will not include these items. All previous rewards included.

SIGNED POSTER + EXTRA KEYS - Receive a signed exclusive backer only poster from the Gorilla Press Games team, plus an extra copy of the game for a friend (3 keys total).All previous rewards included except for the $60 T-Shirt tier.

HALL OF CHAMPIONS + DEVELOPER ACCESS - Have your name etched in the Hall of Champions. This is the memorial for all past Jousting Champions. Also when your name is clicked on in the Hall it will be spoken by the Gods. A fictitious character name may be chosen within reason. Receive access to weekly developer meetings. During these meetings we will hold a Q&A session. Also gain access to a Private Voting system. This system will allow you to vote on different aspects of the game and directly shape its development. All previous rewards included except for the $60 T-Shirt tier.

NPC + SIDE QUEST - Create your own NPC that will be placed in the world of Umber. Design the NPC's Race, Gender, Look, and Name. Also create your own side quest for Legend of the Lancer. You may select where the quest will be located in the world, its title, requirements, and reward.  All previous rewards included except for the $60 T-Shirt tier.

ENEMY + OUTCOME - Create a enemy for your selected level and also help craft an outcome of one of our side stories. Detail the enemy look, its AI Behavior, and location. You will pick for a set of side stories for our hero and create an outcome for that story.  All previous rewards included except for the $60 T-Shirt tier.

BOSS PACKAGE - This is your chance to create one of the Legendary Bosses in the Legend of the Lancer story. Design the Boss's look, backstory, AI Behavior, Location in the world, and Name. You also can help design the reward for the Boss if defeated.  All previous rewards included except for the $60 T-Shirt tier.

VIP PARTY + LANCE REPLICA + EXTRA KEYS -  You will be invited to a VIP Launch Party in Raleigh, NC with the Gorilla Press Games staff. (Travel not Included). Be the first to sit down and play through the game before launch. Receive a mid-size replica of the Holy Lance from Legend of the Lancer. Receive 10 additional keys to share with friends ( 13 key total).  All previous rewards included except for the $60 T-Shirt tier.
